title: You’re Gonna Break the Engagement? Right? - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Bickering Couple   Engagement   Female Protagonist   Nobles   Oneshot   Royalty
author: Kurokawa Tenri   黒川天理
description: A noble girl is engaged to a prince. One day the prince tells her he will break off the engagement. She is very happy. Now she won´t have to go through the harsh queen training. However, is the prince for real or is he just joking.>
